thread.title: Stop and Stare at the Smoldering Beauty Looks From the Grammys Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Stop and Stare at the Smoldering Beauty Looks From the Grammys Red Carpet

author: Emily Orofino
title: Stop and Stare at the Smoldering Beauty Looks From the Grammys Red Carpet
text:
Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Stop and Stare at the Smoldering Beauty Looks From the Grammys Red Carpet 
The musicians attending the Grammys don't reserve daring shows of self-expression for their award-nominated hits. Just one look at the red carpet proves that they also flaunt their creativity via hair and makeup. See for yourself! Read on for Lea Michele 's orchid shadow, Adele's signature cat eye, and more glimpses of stunning beauty style.
